Malachi 3:6
I am the Lord your God and I never change.
Psalm 103:8
I am full of mercy and grace and I overflow with love.
Psalm 33:11
The intentions of My heart will remain steadfast forever.
Genesis 1:27-28
I created you in My own image with My special blessing.
Ephesians 1:4-5
I chose you to be adopted into My family before creation.
Colossians 1:12-13
I delivered you from darkness into the kingdom of My beloved Son.
John 3:16
I have given you eternal life because you have believed in Jesus Christ.
Galatians 4:6
I sent the Spirit of My Son into your heart so you could call Me Father.
Galatians 3:29
Since you are in Christ, I have made you an heir of all My promises.
Ezekiel 36:26-27
I have given you a new heart and put My own Spirit in you.
Jeremiah 29:11
My plan for your future is filled with hope.
Philippians 2:13
I am at work in your life through the desires of your heart.
Psalm 23:2
I will give you rest in green pastures and lead you to still waters.
John 3:34
I give My Spirit in unlimited measure.
Psalm 37:24
I will take hold of your hand to keep you from falling.
Hebrews 13:20-21
I will provide every good thing you need to do My will.
Proverbs 3:11-12
I will discipline you in love, as a father who loves His children.
2 Corinthians 12:9
My power will rest on you when you are weak.
Numbers 6:24
I will bless your life and keep watch over you always.
Jeremiah 29:13
If you search for Me with all your heart, you will find Me.
Psalm 97:10
I will shield your life and deliver you from the wicked.
1 Peter 5:7
Cast all your worries on Me, for I really care about you.
1 Corinthians 10:13
I will not let you be tested beyond what you can endure.
1 Corinthians 13:4-7
My love will persevere through every situation.
Psalm 84:11
I will not withhold anything good from those with an upright heart.
Psalm 146:9
I look after foreigners and I help the fatherless and the widow.
Psalm 116:6
I will guard those who have a childlike heart.
Romans 8:37
You are more than a conqueror through My love in Jesus Christ.
1 Peter 5:4
When Jesus appears, you will receive a crown of glory that will never dim.
Matthew 13:43
At the end of the age, My righteous ones will shine like the sun in My kingdom.
Joshua 23:14
Not one of My promises will ever fail you.
Psalms 103:19
I am seated in the heavens and My kingdom reigns over all.
Isaiah 46:10
All My plans will be fulfilled, for I know the end from the beginning.
Jeremiah 1:5
I knew you before you were born and I designed you for My purposes.
Colossians 1:21-22
You are holy and free from blame because of Jesus Christ’s death.
Isaiah 44:22
I have blotted out your sins and dissolved them like the mist.
Ephesians 1:13-14
I have sealed you with My Spirit to guarantee your coming inheritance.
2 Corinthians 6:18
I will be a real Father to you.
Psalm 32:8
I will look after you and teach you the way that is best.
Proverbs 3:5-6
Trust in Me with all your heart and I will guide you.
2 Thessalonians 3:16
I will give you peace at all times and in every situation.
Psalm 91:15
Call on Me when you are in trouble and I will rescue you.
Psalm 61:3
I am your shelter and a place of safety from your enemies.
Isaiah 64:4
If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf.
1 Corinthians 13:8
My love will never fail you.
Psalm 23:1
I am your Shepherd and I will meet all your needs.
John 10:29
I will keep you safe because no one can snatch you out of My hand.
Psalm 147:3
I will heal your broken heart and mend all your wounds.
Matthew 5:4
I will bless you in times of mourning with My comfort.
2 Corinthians 3:17
You will find freedom wherever My Spirit dwells.
1 John 4:16
You can know and depend on the love that I have for you.
Psalm 9:10
You can trust in Me for I will never forsake you.
